snippet: The so-called revolving door between private sector and government posts has several positive implications, and it means that law enforcement officials have some first-hand knowledge of how the industry they regulate works, the author writes.
abstract: The so-called revolving door between private sector and government posts has several positive implications, and it means that law enforcement officials have some first-hand knowledge of how the industry they regulate works, the author writes.

headline.main: At the S.E.C., a Revolving Door That Helps the Public
